Reviews.Title: “A theft in a hotel run by nuns.”
Reviews.Author: alfredva
Reviews.Content: coming tripwe decided spend night di santa resuming trip home following daythe bathroom outside balcony water fixtures couldnt shower following dayas train 300 pm lady reception leave trolleys 200 pm leave ladys assurance safe lock arrived home discovered jewels trolley called nun answered told wrote letter nun responsible hotel describing event reply week arrived decided tripadvisor travellers aware hotel run nuns belongings

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful - would recommend staying here”
